set.name: HTS
set.longname: Hatsuniji: We Stare Through the Window, Together, Holding Hands

card.name: Training Dummy
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) When this creature dies, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Inherited Scythe
Construction Zone
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Construction Zone: Conjure a basic land of your choice onto the battlefield tapped. You may conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. If you do, untap that land. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Instructor of Untold Secrets
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Deathtouch

card.name: Vengeant Husk
card.text: When Vengeant Husk enters, each player sacrifices a creature. Conjure a card named Fatigue in your hand for each token your opponents sacrifice this way. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Starcrossed Savior
card.text: When Starcrossed Savior enters, [b][target creature gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn.][/b] Flash technique {1}{B} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Professor of Fright
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Menace

card.name: Reckless Firestarter
card.text: When Reckless Firestarter enters, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, [b][Reckless Firestarter deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.][/b] Flash technique {4}{R} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Oni-Blooded Retainer
card.text: Flying Whenever Oni-Blooded Retainer attacks, you may mill a card. Then if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Oni-Blooded Retainer gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Dealer of Undeath
card.text: Lifelink When Dealer of Undeath enters, [b][return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.][/b] Technique {W} (You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Concavity of the Rainbow
card.text: When Concavity of the Rainbow enters, you gain 5 life. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Anguished Decree
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Futile Endeavor
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Scry 2, then draw two cards.

card.name: Endless Nights
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. If you chose a card with mana value 3 or greater this way, conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Burst of the Silent Snake
card.text: Destroy target creature or enchantment with mana value X.

card.name: Afternoon Snack
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you've cast another spell this turn. Exile target creature. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Lethargic First Year
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: Pugnacious Paragon
card.text: When Pugnacious Paragon enters, mill three cards. Then you may return a land card from your graveyard to your hand. Pugnacious Paragon gets +3/+1 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Workout Mentor
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) This creature gets +1/+1 and has trample as long as it is tapped.

card.name: Boisterous Bright
card.text: When Boisterous Bright enters, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment. If its mana value was 1 or greater, conjure a card named Fatigue on the top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Neon Junkie Recruit
card.text: When Neon Junkie Recruit enters, you may [b][search your library for a Forest land, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.][/b] Technique {1}{G} (You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Field Commander
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card you've drawn outside your draw step this turn. Vigilance, reach

card.name: Radiant Reckoner
card.text: Trample When Radiant Reckoner enters, [b][create two 1/1 Horror creature tokens that are all colors.][/b] Technique {1}{W} (You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Underground Profiteer
card.text: When Underground Profiteer enters, [b][return target non-Rogue creature card from your graveyard to your hand.][/b] Technique {B} (You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Maw to Consume All
card.text: When Maw to Consume All enters, create two 1/1 Horror creature tokens that are all colors. Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Bullet Lance Ambush
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

card.name: Five-Mountain Crush
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {2} or conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.") Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Training Montage
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. Create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: Eclipse with Color
card.text: Create a tapped colorless land token named Everywhere that is every basic land type. Conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Bring Color to those Astray
card.text: Mill three cards, then you may return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. {2}, Exile a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and Bring Color to those Astray from your graveyard: Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Precursor of Light and put it onto the battlefield. If you searched your library this way, shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Professor of Hidden Arts
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: Bullheaded Recruit
card.text: Prowess When Bullheaded Recruit enters, you may discard a card. If you do, [b][draw two cards.][/b] Flash technique {2}{U} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Prismad Reformer
card.text: Haste When Prismad Reformer enters, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Heavy Artillery Monitor
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) This creature gets +2/+0 as long as it is tapped.

card.name: Delinquent Duo
card.text: Menace When Delinquent Duo enters, [b][create a 1/1 Horror creature token that's all colors and a Treasure token.][/b] Technique {1}{G} (You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Vanguard of Fiery Fury
card.text: Trample When Vanguard of Fiery Fury enters, [b][Vanguard of Fiery Fury deals 2 damage to any target.][/b] Flash technique {R} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Neon Junkie Kyodai
card.text: Trample Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Neon Junkie Kyodai deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Arrogant Jock
card.text: Prowess When Arrogant Jock enters, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Guardian of the Fray
card.text: Defender, reach {T}: Guardian of the Fray deals 1 damage to each opponent. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Guardian of the Fray.

card.name: Crash Through
card.text: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Greater Together
card.text: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. Instant and sorcery spells cast this way cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Dangle the Autograph
card.text: Choose one — • Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. • Create two 1/1 red Student creature tokens.

card.name: Ace the Test
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {2} or conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.") Ace the Test deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Blessing from the Stars
card.text: Enchant creature When Blessing from the Stars enters, target creature can't block this turn. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has prowess. (Each instance of prowess triggers separately.)

card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.text: Prowess, vigilance {T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to cast a noncreature spell.

card.name: Pactbinder Initiate
card.text: Flying Whenever you draw a card, tap target creature.

card.name: Plucky Visionary
card.text: When Plucky Visionary enters, you may [b][return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.][/b] Flash technique {2}{U} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Skyhigh Bright
card.text: Flying When Skyhigh Bright enters, you may conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. If you do, return target creature you don't control to its owner's hand. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Tattooed Master
card.text: When Tattooed Master enters, [b][scry 2, then draw a card.][/b] Flash technique {1}{B} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Drown in Homework
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {2} or conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.") Counter target spell. If you didn't conjure a card to cast this spell, scry 2.

card.name: Take Recon
card.text: Scry 1, then draw a card. Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Group Study Session
card.text: Draw three cards. Untap up to two creatures you control.

card.name: Cram Week
card.text: Enchant creature When Cram Week enters, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature loses all abilities and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Detention
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if there is a card named Fatigue in your graveyard. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.") Target creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: Moving On, Looking Forward
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Swiftsteel Wonder
card.text: When Swiftsteel Wonder enters, [b][target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.][/b] Flash technique {1}{R} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Dawnpulse Savior
card.text: Prowess When Dawnpulse Savior enters, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Cool Kids Clique
card.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Cool Kids Clique.

card.name: Radiant Artillery
card.text: Flying When Radiant Artillery enters, you may [b][tap target creature and put a stun counter on it.][/b] Technique {U} (You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Overprotective Senior
card.text: Lifelink When Overprotective Senior enters, [b][return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.][/b] Flash technique {W} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Speed Coach
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) During your turn, this creature has first strike.

card.name: Uplifting Coach
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Flying

card.name: Afterschool Theater Club
card.text: When this enchantment enters, create two 2/2 blue Student creature tokens. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player or planeswalker, untap target creature.

card.name: Admired Superhero
card.text: Vigilance Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

card.name: Sixth Period Skippers
card.text: Whenever Sixth Period Skippers deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may discard a card. If you do, search your library for a card named Sixth Period Skippers, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Confine to Everywhere
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {2} or conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.") When this enchantment enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Moment of Decision
card.text: Enchant creature As long as another player controls enchanted creature, it can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. Otherwise, enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has prowess. (Each instance of prowess triggers separately.)

card.name: Appeal to Sensibilities
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target enchantment. • Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. • Draw a card.

card.name: Itami, Enervated
card.text: Itami can't block and can't be blocked. Whenever Itami deals combat damage to a player, each player discards a card. Put a +1/+1 counter on Itami if you discarded the card with the highest mana value among those cards or tied for highest.

card.name: Chinatsu, Hero to All
card.text: Vigilance Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control if that spell was green. Creatures you control gain menace and haste until end of turn if that spell was red. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn if that spell was white.

card.name: Kumiko, Brightest in the Sky
card.text: Flying When you cast your first spell each turn, add {R}{R}. When you cast your third spell each turn, put three +1/+1 counters on Kumiko. When you cast your fifth spell each turn, Kumiko deals 5 damage to any target.

card.name: Banri, Guide in the Sky
card.text: Flash Flying Whenever this enters or you cast your first noncreature spell each turn, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Akio, Always Watchful
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Akio attacks, scry 2. {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. Akio gains protection from each of that card's types until end of turn.

card.name: The Fate-Scarred
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever another creature you control enters, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn — • That creature gets +1/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. • Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. • You gain 3 life.

card.name: Prestigious Schoolmaster
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, they lose half their life, rounded up.

card.name: Harbinger of Fallen Fates
card.text: Flying When Harbinger of Fallen Fates enters, each opponent conjures two cards named Fatigue into their hand. (They're colorless sorceries that cost {2} with "Draw a card.") Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Wings of Despair
card.text: Flying When Wings of Despair enters, if you cast it, [b][destroy all creatures][/b] you don't control. Technique {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Quickwitted Adversary
card.text: Prowess Whenever Quickwitted Adversary attacks, reveal the top card of your library, then put it into your hand. You lose life equal to twice that card's mana value minus Quickwitted Adversary's power.

card.name: Placate the Demon King
card.text: Target opponent chooses a number. When they do, choose one — • That player sacrifices that many creatures of their choice. • Create a black Demon Mystic creature token with flying whose base power and toughness are each equal to 7 minus that number.

card.name: Lost in Everywhere
card.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a plot counter on this enchantment and each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {2}{B}, Sacrifice Lost in Everywhere: Draw cards equal to the number of plot counters on it.

card.name: Loathed Archvillain
card.text: Trample Whenever Loathed Archvillain deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card. Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Loathed Archvillain.

card.name: Applied Gym Coach
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Trample Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value less than that damage, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Citycrusher Behemoth
card.text: Haste Whenever Citycrusher Behemoth attacks, creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. [b][prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn][/b] by nonattacking creatures. Flash technique {G} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Everywhere Beckons
card.text: For each color among nontoken permanents you control as you cast this spell, choose one — • Target player creates a 3/3 colorless Homunculus creature token. • Create a tapped colorless land token named Everywhere that is every basic land type. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment. • Target player gains 7 life. • Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Teamwork Makes the Dream Work
card.text: Creatures you control get +X/+X and gain trample until end of turn, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Platoon Intern
card.text: Trample Whenever Platoon Intern deals combat damage to a player, conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Starwalker
card.text: {W}{U}, Return an unblocked attacking creature you control to its owner's hand: Put Starwalker from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Whenever one or more creatures you control deals combat damage to a player, reveal that many cards from the top card of your library. Put one of them into your hand and you gain life equal to that card's mana value. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Inked Diabolist
card.text: {1}, Exile an instant or sorcery spell you control: Return target creature card with equal or lesser mana value than the exiled spell from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Fame Chaser
card.text: Ward—Pay 3 life. During your turn, instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard have flashback. Their flashback cost is equal to their mana cost minus {1} for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

card.name: Faded Hero
card.text: Trample The first spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast. Faded Hero gets +1/+1 for each color among spells you've cast this turn.

card.name: Lovely Afternoon at the Park
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may exile a card from your graveyard. Create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying if you exiled an instant or sorcery card this way. Otherwise, create a 3/3 colorless Homunculus creature token.

card.name: Murmurs of Hope and Life
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it, where X is the number of creatures that died under your control this turn.

card.name: Emissary of Foxflame
card.text: {T}: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Emissary of Foxflame.

card.name: Channeler of the Wilds
card.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, untap each land you control, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Frazzled Destinies Entwine
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You may cast Frazzled Destinies Entwine from your graveyard by paying its mana cost plus exiling any number of cards from your graveyard with five or more card types among them.

card.name: Harmony in Mayhem
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever Harmony in Mayhem enters and whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 red Student creature token.

card.name: Field Trainer
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard with equal or lesser mana value and add that much {R}. You may only spend that mana to cast that spell.

card.name: Dancer on the Clouds
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Dancer on the Clouds attacks,[b] [Dancer on the Clouds deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.][/b] Flash technique {2}{R} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Boundless Swiftness
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 red Student creature token. Then if that spell was named Fatigue, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Commune with the Cosmic Dance
card.text: Until end of turn, you may cast instant or sorcery spells from your graveyard. If this spell was cast from your graveyard, until end of turn, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery card, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Techniques are instant or sorcery spells.) Flashback {4}{R}{R}

card.name: Capture the Spectrum
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, create a Treasure token. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: You may cast a noncreature spell with mana value four or less you own from outside the game without paying its mana cost. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Show Off
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {2} or conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.") You may choose new targets for target spell or ability.

card.name: Hallway Wanderer
card.text: Whenever Hallway Wanderer deals combat damage to a player, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.") {2}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hallway Wanderer. It can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Hero of Resolute Will
card.text: Flash Whenever Hero of Resolute Will enters or an opponent casts their first noncreature spell each turn, [b][counter target spell.][/b] Flash technique {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Master of Knowledge
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, tap target nonland permanent defending player controls and put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Deluge of Colors
card.text: Create three 1/1 Fish Horror creature tokens with flying that are all colors. For each token, exile the top card of your library. When that token deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, return the exiled card to your hand.

card.name: Besmear
card.text: Choose a mana value. Return all creatures that aren't of that mana value to their owner's hands.

card.name: Warning Call
card.text: Scry 1, then draw a card. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may return this card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Homeroom Bully
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Homeroom Bully. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand instead. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Veracious Soultender
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value 2 or less revealed this way into your hand.

card.name: Hearthsoul Kirin
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, [b][choose two from flying, vigilance, lifelink, or indestructible. Creatures you control gain those abilities until end of turn.] [/b]Flash technique {2}{W} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Tear the World Asunder
card.text: Destroy all creatures with base power 3 or greater.

card.name: Barrage from Above
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target multicolored permanent. • Draw a card.

card.name: Assemble the Squad
card.text: Exile any number of creatures you control, then return them to the battlefield. If they were attacking and this spell was cast during combat before blockers were declared, they enter the battlefield attacking.

card.name: Offering to Monotony
card.text: Ward—Pay 2 life. Sacrifice a creature: Offering to Monotony gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Then if its power is 6 or greater, Offering to Monotony gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Trainer of the Empty Mind
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, defending player discards a card.

card.name: Penumbra Agent
card.text: When Penumbra Agent enters, you may [b][search your library for an instant or sorcery card or a card with technique, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.][/b] You lose life equal to that card's mana value. Technique {2}{U} (You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Warden of Those Fallen
card.text: Menace Whenever Warden of Those Fallen attacks, [b][exile up to two cards from a single graveyard. If you do, draw a card][/b] and put a +1/+1 counter on Warden of Those Fallen. Technique {G} (You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Disciple of the Wolf
card.text: When Disciple of the Wolf enters, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, [b][you draw X cards and you lose X life][/b], where X is that creature's power. Technique {X}{B}{B} (You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its technique cost.)

card.name: Patron of Pride
card.text: Flying Patron of Pride's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Extracurricular Homicide
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You gain 2 life for each card named Fatigue in your graveyard. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Getaway Ride
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.") Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return another creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Spread Thin
card.text: Target player discards two cards. You gain 1 life for each card type among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Unexpected Losses
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")
